content: hector hyena pattern designed by mary smith 2018 page �2 of �8 hector hyena abbreviations chain - chain single_crochet - single_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet increase - increase single_crochet 2 times in the next stitch decrease - decrease stitch next 2 stitches together half_double_crochet decrease - half_double_crochet decrease lpst - loop stitch yo - yarn over slip_stitch - slip_stitch st s - stitch es skip - skip chain or stitch space - space blo - back loop only flo - front loop only r - round - repeat work as directed - number of sts you should have at the end of the round fo - finish off magic_ring - magic_ring finished doll is about 10 tall before you begin this amigurumi/plush is worked in continuous rounds mark the beginning of each round with a stitch marker use the magic_ring when starting rounds there are many youtube videos teaching how to make a magic_ring or magic_ring gauge is not important in this project as long as you are consistent with your gauge exact colors used are listed in italics in the supplies section this project is made with all single_crochet stitches unless otherwise specified copyright 2018 mary smith www ravelry com/designers/mary-smith � page �3 of �8 hector hyena supplies worsted weight 4 in colors listed below light brown body red heart buff 200 yds white eyes red heart white 5 yds dark brown hands feet muzzle impeccable big chocolate 50 yds cream ears fur i love this yarn cream 50 yds black nose red heart black 5 yds 2 - 15mm safety eyes crochet hook size f/5 3 75mm wire brush yarn needle stitch markers fiberfill or stuffing of choice body with light brown r1 magic_ring single_crochet 6 r2 increase x6 12 r3 increase single_crochet 1 x6 18 r4 increase single_crochet 2 x6 24 r5 increase single_crochet 3 x6 30 r6 single_crochet 2 increase single_crochet 4 x5 increase single_crochet 2 36 r7 increase single_crochet 5 x6 42 r8 single_crochet 3 increase single_crochet 6 x5 increase single_crochet 3 48 r9 increase single_crochet 7 x6 54 r10-18 single_crochet 54 r19 decrease single_crochet 7 x6 48 r20-24 single_crochet 48 r25 single_crochet 3 decrease single_crochet 6 x5 decrease single_crochet 3 42 r26-27 single_crochet 42 r28 decrease single_crochet 5 x6 36 r29-30 single_crochet 36 r31 single_crochet 2 decrease single_crochet 4 x5 decrease single_crochet 2 30 r32 single_crochet 30 stuff r33 decrease single_crochet 3 x6 24 r34 single_crochet 24 r35 decrease single_crochet 2 x6 18 r36 single_crochet 18 fo leave 18 end finish stuffing copyright 2018 mary smith www ravelry com/designers/mary-smith � page �4 of �8 hector hyena head with light brown r1 magic_ring single_crochet 6 r2 increase x6 12 r3 increase single_crochet 1 x6 18 r4 increase single_crochet 2 x6 24 r5 increase single_crochet 3 x6 30 r6 single_crochet 2 increase single_crochet 4 x5 increase single_crochet 2 36 r7 increase single_crochet 5 x6 42 r8 single_crochet 3 increase single_crochet 6 x5 increase single_crochet 3 48 r9 increase single_crochet 7 x6 54 r10-16 single_crochet
